title: "chisq"
author: "Gregor de Cillia"
output: html_document
runtime: shiny
---

```{r, results ='hide', message=FALSE}
library( shinyLikert )
testData2 = createTestData()
```


```{r}
plot(
  renderShinyLikert( 
    testData2,
    split    = c( "difficulty", "gender", "country" )
  ) 
)
```

```{r}
plot( 
  renderShinyLikert( 
    testData2,
    height  = c(500,800),
    dropdown = "difficulty",
    group = "country"
  ) 
)
```


```{r}
plot(
  renderShinyLikert( 
    testData2,
    split    = c( "difficulty", "gender", "country" ),
    custom_tests = list( 
      anova =  function(item,factor){
          anova( lm( as.numeric(item) ~ factor ) )$`Pr(>F)`[1]
      } 
    )
  ) 
)
```
